str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Apparently a primary verb; which uses dremo drem'-o as alternate in certain tenses; to run or walk hastily.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To fill, load. Transitive from gemo; to fill entirely.
A sponge. Perhaps of foreign origin; a 'sponge'.
Vinegar, sour wine mixed with water, a common drink of Roman soldiers. From oxus; vinegar, i.e. Sour wine.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To place or put around, clothe; fig: I bestow, confer. From peri and tithemi; to place around; by implication, to present.
A reed; a reed-pen, reed-staff, measuring rod. Or uncertain affinity; a reed; by implication, a pen.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To cause to drink, give to drink; irrigate, water. From a derivative of the alternate of pino; to furnish drink, irrigate.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From apo and hiemi; to send forth, in various applications.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.
Elijah, the prophet. Of Hebrew origin; Helias, an Israelite.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular

str2: (a) I take down, pull down, depose, destroy. From kata and haireomai; to lower demolish.
